channel.title: Drop item vanishing
channel.description: Hello I am using the Nividia source and client and I have a problem. I can find everything else but I can't find where to change the item vanishing thing when you drop it. So the question is when I drop an item it vanishes.. How do I remove this?

item.title: Drop item vanishing
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

For future reference, if you see [tt]//[/tt] in front of a line of code, it means that line is commented out.

Any code on that line will not be executed. So basically if you saw that the line to ‘create ground item’ was commented out, it would tell you that it isn’t going to drop the item.

Glad you got it solved though

Read full topic

item.title: Drop item vanishing
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“RedFalconBlue, post:4, topic:400804”]//Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId());
to

maybe try that[/quote]

Worked!! Thank you very much.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop item vanishing
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

I did this but I don’t know what to delete from this code: if(c.playerItemsN[slot] != 0 && itemId != -1 && c.playerItems[slot] == itemId + 1) { if(droppable) { if (c.underAttackBy > 0) { if (c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId) > 1000) { c.sendMessage("You may not drop items worth more than 1000 while in combat."); return; } } //Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, itemId, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.playerItemsN[slot], c.getId()); c.getItems().deleteItem(itemId, slot, c.playerItemsN[slot]); c.sendMessage("The item you drop vanishes."); PlayerSave.saveGame(c); } else { c.sendMessage("This items cannot be dropped."); } }

Read full topic

Use your wits for the rest.
